comments: a(n) = 6 * A067046(n); A007947(a(n)) = A078637(n); also denominator of h(n+2) - h(n-1), where h(n) is the n-th harmonic number sum(1/k, k=1..n), the numerator is A188386. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 04 2012
